aenvironment 0.0.1
  • Reference

Environment

environment.Rd

Add environment

a_environment(...)

aenvironment_dependency(version = "0.8.2", cdn = FALSE)

aenvironment_dep(version = "0.8.2", cdn = FALSE)

Arguments

...

any aframer components.
version

Version to pass to a_scene.
cdn

Wether to use local of CDN for source files.

Details

Valid preset:

  • none

  • default

  • contact

  • egypt

  • checkboard

  • forest

  • goaland

  • goldmine

  • threetowers

  • poison

  • arches

  • tron

  • japan

  • dream

  • volcano

  • starry

  • osiris

  • yavapai

Note

Source a_dependency before aenvironment_dependency.

See also

official documentation.

Examples

library(aframer)

browse_aframe(
  a_scene(
    a_dependency(),
    aenvironment_dependency(),
    a_environment(
      environment = aframer::opts_aframe(
        preset = "forest"
      )
    )
  )
)

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Details
  • Note
  • See also
  • Examples
